metadata.title: USN-6274-1 -- XMLTooling vulnerability
metadata.description: Jurien de Jong discovered that XMLTooling did not properly handle certain KeyInfo element content within an XML signature. An attacker could possibly use this issue to achieve server-side request forgery.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6274-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  xmltooling-schemas - 1.5.6-2ubuntu0.3+esm1 libxmltooling6v5 - 1.5.6-2ubuntu0.3+esm1 libxmltooling-dev - 1.5.6-2ubuntu0.3+esm1 libxmltooling-doc - 1.5.6-2ubuntu0.3+esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro
